description:
With the mysterious cosmic material, Negum 13, safely off the ship, Midge and the others try to figure out their next move, but when Doc and Midge seek to investigate the Mother Tree, Ellen and the others try to deter them out of respect for Sulkosky`s wishes. Undeterred, Doc and Midge decide to sneak off the ship and investigate the tree anyway. When Sulkosky discovers Midge and Doc going against his wishes he confronts the pair and tries to stop them by force. In the midst of their in-fighting, another bug buster appears and begins attacking inside the dome. The Mother Tree is hit by a stray shot and its true identity is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Approaching the Mysterious Large Tree / Shock! The Mother Tree`s True Form
Nazo no Kyoboku ni Semare / Shougeki! Mother Tree no Shoutai
謎の巨木に迫れ / 衝撃! マザーツリーの正体
